original_title: Sinéad O'Connor: The Value of Ignorance
overview: The concert was recorded live at the Dominion Theatre in London, on June 3, 1988.  TracklistHide Credits  1	Jackie  2	Just Like You Said It Would Be  3	Mandinka  4	Just Call Me Joe  5	Never Get Old  6	Jerusalem  7	Troy  8	I Am Stretched On Your Grave
